Articles.Title: Jon Bernthal to Reprise Punisher Role in Daredevil: Born Again
Articles.Description: Another familiar Marvel face has joined Daredevil: Born Again, as Jon Bernthal will be returning as Frank Castle/The Punisher in the Disney+ series. According to THR, Bernthal will once again be playing Marvel’s famous antihero in the upcoming Daredevil serie…
Articles.Content:
